description:
Mega Man X4 is a 1997 action-platform game developed and published by Capcom. 
Mega Man X4 allows the player to choose between the two mechanoid "Reploids" protagonists at the beginning of the game
X, who uses an arm cannon; or Zero, who wields an energy blade.
Two Maverick Hunters, X and Zero, fight against a Reploid army called the "Repliforce" who are waging war against humanity to earn their independence.

v1.0.0.description:
A version with many known issues but playable ;)

Archipelago Steps

1. Download the YAML and change the name inside of it and the file name
2. Put the APWorld in your custom worlds
3. Generate with the YAML in the players folder and host

Client Steps

1. Put the APWorld in your custom worlds for the [Archipelago Launcher](https://archipelago.gg/tutorial/Archipelago/setup_en)
2. Through the launcher run the Bizhawk Client tool
3. Download and install Bizhawk
4. Legally Obtain PSX Firmware for Bizhawk
5. Legally Obtain a USA Version of the MMX4 ROM
6. Apply the XDelta patch here to the ROM, can use [this tool](https://kotcrab.github.io/xdelta-wasm/)
7. Run your Patched ROM in Bizhawk
8. From your Archipelago Launcher folder go to Data/Lua and put connector_bizhawk_generic.lua in your Bizhawk Tools/Lua Console Scripts
9. Connect to your created room through the Bizhawk Client Tool in the Archipelago Launcher
